basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ Hi, I'm a Full stack python developer with a strong background in IT support that has a passion to engineer and create through code to help support end users. I love bringing simple solutions to complex problems. With a wide demographic background that loves to connect to consumers to create and solve problems through Tech. Lastly, a veteran of the US army with a diverse background in the private and government sector.

projects.title: The Travel Card Game
projects.description: My first project as a developer. Working with a great team we were able to create a card game that allows user to study while tracking their highscore. I was able to make this come alive using only html, javscript, and css with no third party apis.

projects.title: Urban Potatoes
projects.description: This application is a social site for movie lovers. Giving users the freedom to browse the latest movies and interact with users on a social forum. Did I also mention you can save all your favorite movies ever to your own profile.

projects.title: Low-Ballers Price Comparison
projects.description: Ever want to get the lowest price on a item ? Well using webscraping I was able to create a terminal application that let's a user shop on the SHOPMYEXCHANGE (military website) and enter their url and price. Then using automation, bots, and apis. Bring back the lowest price compared to Target, Walmart,Sears, Amazon, and Bestbuy.
